channel.title: Jira on CARLES BLOG
channel.description: Recent content in Jira on CARLES BLOG

item.title: Basic Introduction to Jira
item.description: This article is going to be much less technical than the ones I use to write, the goal is to simply provide a basic introduction to Jira and some of it’s main capacities. Hopefully in the near future this article will work as the introduction on a Jira manual that my team and myself are writting for my current employeer, I thought before all that manual is finished it might be useful to share this here.
